name: The Citadel of Yah-Mon
overview: You start, alone on a small boat when the island of Yah-Mon breaks the surface under you. In the confusion your small boat is lost and you are stranded on this island. Search for and survive the Citadel of Yah-Mon, man and defeat the sorcerer within, then escape the island safely. A text adventure written in AdventureWriter\Quill, dude.
